title: So I started watching Bleach
body:
You know, that 12 YEAR OLD ANIME (holy feck im old)

This may be one of my favorite animes ever.

Holy mother of god, it has slightly meh writing, but it is holy mother of awesomeness

Also, the characters are badasses and I have without a doubt fallen in love with Rukia and Urahara.

Please, I need to keep my life.

Not like this

*Not like this!*
